Uses of Package
org.marc4j.marc

Packages that use org.marc4j.marc
org.marc4j This package contains an event-based parser to process MARC records. 
org.marc4j.helpers This package contains helper classes. 
org.marc4j.marc This package contains a record object model to store and edit MARC records or parts of records as objects. 
org.marc4j.marcxml This package contains SAX2 event consumers and producers to read and write MARCXML. 
org.marc4j.util This package contains utilities. 
 

Classes in org.marc4j.marc used by org.marc4j
Leader
          Leader defines behaviour for the record label (record position 00-23).
 

Classes in org.marc4j.marc used by org.marc4j.helpers
Leader
          Leader defines behaviour for the record label (record position 00-23).
Record
          Record defines behaviour for a record.
 

Classes in org.marc4j.marc used by org.marc4j.marc
ControlField
          ControlField defines behaviour for a control field (tag 001-009).
DataField
          DataField defines behaviour for a data field (tag 010-999).
Leader
          Leader defines behaviour for the record label (record position 00-23).
MarcException
          MarcException is thrown when an error occurs while processing a record object.
Record
          Record defines behaviour for a record.
Subfield
          Subfield defines behaviour for a subfield (a data element within a data field).
VariableField
          VariableField defines general behaviour for variable fields.
 

Classes in org.marc4j.marc used by org.marc4j.marcxml
Leader
          Leader defines behaviour for the record label (record position 00-23).
 

Classes in org.marc4j.marc used by org.marc4j.util
Leader
          Leader defines behaviour for the record label (record position 00-23).
